#: Note that this test will need a bit more complexity in the test generator.
The generator will need to take into account that we have three method
calls, as well as to correctly format the long expected results number
dependant on the relevant language style eg 25_164_150 in Ruby.
In addition, some languages can include a test for consistent differences
which will need to be explictly articulated in the test generation template.
This test would have the form: assert_equal squares.difference, squares.difference
expressed in a lnaguage apprpriate syntax an style
